Is this app free?

Yes, it's available for free under the Sideview Internal Use License Agreement which you or possibly someone else at your company accepted when you downloaded the app.

How is it that these modules used to be released as "Sideview Utils" under LGPL 3 and now they're distributed using a non-OSS agreement?

We wanted different terms for the new version, so we switched to a different contract. (Since Sideview is the sole contributor to Sideview Utils, the LGPL version is and has always been a fork of the proprietary project.)

What if I want to use Sideview Utils for more than just internal use?

In most cases, you can do this if you enter into a separate agreement with Sideview. Contact us for more details.
